text:
Hey all, I have this problem and I can't find how to fix it. I want to hs auth / hs init in my brand new local theme. It asks me to "Open <http://HubSpot.com|HubSpot.com> to copy your personal access key? (Y/n)" We choose Y so we can choose the account where we want the key to copy from. But the problem is that HubSpot opens the same account and I can't choose another. Normally you'll get the account overview where you choose the account you want to use.

Anybody knows how to bypass this or use another command to hs auth / hs init based on account ID or something (no luck with hs auth --portal=XXXXXXXX)

Yeah so it turn out that this was the fix but I still have the problem that it won't let me choose another account if I choose open HubSpot to copy key.

command that works:

`hs init --account=XXXXXXXX`
you can always open this url manually as well :slightly_smiling_face: <https://app.HubSpot.com/portal-recommend/l?slug=personal-access-key>
